00043   // Enumerated Types
00045   enum PacketType {    PacketType_UnidentifiedData    = 0,    PacketType_Data                = 1,    PacketType_UnidentifiedExtData = 2,    PacketType_ExtData             = 3,    PacketType_Context             = 4,    PacketType_ExtContext          = 5,    PacketType_Command             = 6,    PacketType_ExtCommand          = 7,    PacketType_reserved8           = 8,    PacketType_reserved9           = 9,    PacketType_reserved10          = 10,    PacketType_reserved11          = 11,    PacketType_reserved12          = 12,    PacketType_reserved13          = 13,    PacketType_reserved14          = 14,    PacketType_reserved15          = 15
00062   };

00608     public: inline static int32_t getPacketLength (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off) {
00609       return ((0xFF & ((int32_t)buf[off+2])) << 10) | ((0xFF & ((int32_t)buf[off+3])) << 2);
00610     }
00611 
00619     public: inline int32_t getPayloadLength () const {
00620       return getPacketLength() - getPrologueLength() - getTrailerLength();
00621     }

00934     // Pack/Unpack
00936 
00937     public: inline void swap (vector<char> *buffer) {
00938       if (buffer == NULL) throw VRTException("Buffer is null");
00939       if (readOnly      ) throw VRTException("Packet is read-only");
00940       bbuf.swap(*buffer);
00941     }
00943     public: inline void swap (BasicVRTPacket *pkt) {
00944       if (pkt  ==  NULL) throw VRTException("Packet is null");
00945       if (readOnly     ) throw VRTException("Packet is read-only");
00946       if (pkt->readOnly) throw VRTException("Packet is read-only");
00947       bbuf.swap(pkt->bbuf);
00948     }

00951     protected: inline void packPayloadByte      (int32_t off, char     val) { VRTMath::packByte(    bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val); }

00982     protected: inline void packPayloadAscii (int32_t off, string val, int32_t len) {
00983       if (len < 0) { // compute max length
00984         int32_t max = -len;
00985         setPayloadLength(off+max);
00986         int32_t act = VRTMath::packAscii(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, max);
00987         if (act < max) setPayloadLength(off+act);
00988       }
00989       else {
00990         VRTMath::packAscii(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len);
00991       }
00992     }
00993 
00995     protected: inline void packPayloadUTF8 (int32_t off, wstring val, int32_t len) {
00996       if (len < 0) { // compute max length
00997         int32_t max = -len;
00998         setPayloadLength(off+max);
00999         int32_t act = VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, max);
01000         if (act < max) setPayloadLength(off+act);
01001       }
01002       else {
01003         VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len);
01004       }
01005     }
01006 
01008     protected: inline void packPayloadUTF8 (int32_t off, string val, int32_t len) {
01009       if (len < 0) { // compute max length
01010         int32_t max = -len;
01011         setPayloadLength(off+max);
01012         int32_t act = VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, max);
01013         if (act < max) setPayloadLength(off+act);
01014       }
01015       else {
01016         VRTMath::packUTF8(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+off, val, len);
01017       }
